entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
